title: spectate
body: Can we not spectate games in season 7 yet?

replies.body:
*EmeraldPool* is correct. Spectate hasn't made it to the Beta Client just yet. You can access the Legacy Client (where spectate is enabled) using the button at login screen, as shown below:

https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/article_attachments/215576628/Launch-Legacy-Client.jpg

Let me know if you have any questions.
Is there an ETA on when spectate will be enabled for the new client?  I figured it would be enabled with the rollout of replays.  Thanks for the help!
I don't have an ETA since I don't work on the New Client team, sorry. I'm confident the feature will roll out to the Beta as soon as the team is able to. ^.^
the new client you cant yet. you have to launch the old client to spectate your buddies.
